changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_11"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "ENDERECO" NVARCHAR(60), "NUMERO" NVARCHAR(10), "COMPLEMENTO" NVARCHAR(60), "BAIRRO" NVARCHAR(60), "CEP" NVARCHAR(10), "NOME_CONTAB" NVARCHAR(255), "FONE_CONTAB" NVARCHAR(11), "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
